title: Rock Creek Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.   News  Browse new and old press releases or check out a press kit.  Photos and Multimedia  Experience Rock Creek Park from the comforts of your home. Check out the photo galleries or view a multimedia presentation.  History and Culture  Learn about the long and varied history of the Rock Creek Valley and the people who have called it home.  Nature   Rock Creek Park serves as a natural oasis within the heavily urbanized District of Columbia. Investigate who lives in Rock Creek Park.  Education   Plan a field trip and review curriculum materials.   Kids and Youth  Are you looking for fun activities to do with your family? Learn how to become a Junior Ranger and get information about our Summer Junior Ranger Camps.  Management   Find documents that relate to the operation, laws and policies of Rock Creek Park.  Bookstore  Eastern National is a non-profit partner of Rock Creek Park. A percentage of sales returns to Rock Creek Park to support diverse interpretive and education programs
